Using their [[Kunai Blade]]s, connected by chains, Izumo and Kotetsu slash the opponent, who is immediately bound by the chains, causing them to become immobilised.

== Trivia ==
* Though unnamed in the anime and manga, this technique was named in ''Naruto Mobile''.
